news.title: Release Day Status
news.author: Snowy ♡
news.summary: Thank you for joining us on release day! We’re blown away by the turnout and want to share the current server status and what’s coming next.

sections.content: Hi everyone! Thank you for joining us on our release day. We're pleasantly surprised by the turnout and are super excited to see everyone having such a fun time. With that said, we want to take a moment to talk about the current status of the server and plans moving forward.

sections.title: Known Issues
sections.description: A lot of new bugs have come to light today and will be worked on promptly. While there’s no exact ETA, most issues should be resolved within about a week.

items.title: Rat Wars soft-locks
items.details: Rat Wars may soft lock. Avoid it for now unless you're okay risking a lock just to play.

items.title: Races soft-lock on results
items.details: Less common, but if it happens you can Alt+F4 and rejoin to recover.

items.title: Activity system timer freezes
items.details: Activities (including races) may randomly lock up, preventing new activities from starting.

items.title: Chat is overwhelming
items.details: Chat muting and hiding options are coming soon to reduce noise and connection spam.

items.title: Clothing and tattoos don’t work
items.details: Purchasing these currently has no effect. Don’t waste your money — proper systems are coming.

sections.title: Moving Forward
sections.content: The server will remain open despite the issues above. This is only the beginning — fixes, improvements, and new features are already in motion. We’re just getting started. Stay tuned! <3

news.title: Account Creation Issues
news.author: PixeL
news.summary: We’re aware of an issue preventing new account creation on the website and are working on a fix.

sections.content: We’re currently aware of an issue preventing players from creating new accounts on the website. This is a problem on our end.

sections.title: Current Issue
sections.description: The following issue is actively being addressed:

items.title: New account creation unavailable
items.details: Players are unable to create new accounts at https://swegta.com/online/. A fix is already in progress and expected to be deployed in the morning.

sections.title: What’s Next
sections.content: This issue will be resolved as soon as possible. Thanks for your patience while we get this sorted.
